definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: In winter I use an electric blanket.
He helped his grandmother turn on the electric blanket when they were about to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺的時候，他幫奶奶打開了電熱毯。

sentences.english: Every winter night, she must borrow heating or electric blanket, can sleep.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天的夜晚，她需藉着暖氣或電熱毯，才能入眠。

sentences.english: We will exchange our typewriter for electric blankets.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以用舊打字機來交換電熱毯。

sentences.english: Does your electric blanket conform to BS 3456?
sentences.chinese: 你們的電熱毯達到英國的3456標準了嗎？

sentences.english: I sleep like a babe with my new electric blanket.
sentences.chinese: 有了新的電熱毯，我睡的就像一個嬰兒。

sentences.english: Love is putting the electrical blanket on his side when he comes home late.
sentences.chinese: 愛是當他回家晚的時候提早把他那邊的電熱毯插上電。

sentences.english: It may power your electric blanket, if you have one.
sentences.chinese: 也可以啓動你的電熱毯，如果你有的話。

sentences.english: I bought an electric blanket for my mother.
sentences.chinese: 我爲母親買了一牀電熱毯。

sentences.english: It is so cold that I bought an electric blanket.
sentences.chinese: 天太冷了，我買了個電熱毯。

sentences.english: With this electric blanket, the grandpa won't feel cold in winter.
sentences.chinese: 有了電熱毯，到了冬天爺爺就不覺得冷了。

definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
to talk endlessly on the phone
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
to take a hotel room/to rent a room
